title: Success or Failure in Your Relationship: Four Basic Principles Needed if You Want a Lifetime Partner
description: We all want meaningful, lasting relationships. So, what is it that can make or break a relationship? This guide will answer those questions and put couples on a path toward a harmonious and long-lasting relationship. With over twenty years of married-life experience, I will tackle and answer the following key How do couples stay together? And why do they fall apart? In Success or Failure in Your Relationship , I’ve written about the four most important concepts that make a relationship work. Many wonder what exactly is wrong with their relationship, and others can’t figure out why it’s not working for them. There are also those who are not in a relationship, but desire a lifetime partner. Finding someone is a different matter. Finding the right person and having the relationship you want are the most important personal and emotional aspects of life. A properly founded relationship is the building block for lifelong happiness.This book will help you decide if you've found your true love and covers straightforward topics that every relationship needs to survive the test of time.Buy your copy now and set the foundation for a lasting relationship.
author: K.E. Martin
